Name: Casanova
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Crumble a piece of Cadbury's Flake over the cocktail.
Review: Rich, medium-sweet and creamy with a mocha coffee finish.
Nutrition: One serving of Casanova contains 284 calories
